content: I don't have access to real-time data. but based on recent statistics, the crime rate in worcester is higher than the national average, and it is higher than the crime rate in some other cities in massachusetts, such as newton and brookline, but lower than the crime rate in cities like springfield and boston. however, it's essential to note that crime rates can vary greatly depending on the specific type of crime, the location within the city, and other factors.
